Can anyone provide me with a datasheet for the TTL-232 Rev NC described here? Encoders from Kit of Parts (Many Years Ago?)

The links in the original post all 404.

Thanks so much for your consideration.

For the benefit of all, here is the driver chip’s data sheet. Again, my apologies.
